name: Bright and Modern Two Bedroom Townhouse.
description: Are you moving to the area and need a place to stay till you get settled? Got a contract in town and don’t want to live out of a hotel? This place is set up nicely for longer term stays. Easy access to the highway to get where you need to be and a large secure garage to store your things or tools. Great, safe and quiet neighborhood. Unfortunately till a few things change in the province (one in particular) we can only accommodate 90+day stays at this time.
neighborhood_overview: This townhouse is located in a new development so the street name may not be found by the maps on your phone. The location however does come up in the maps.
host_about:
Hello from Vancouver Island! My name is Derek and I will be your main contact during your stay. If I happen to be unavailable, my wife Kelly will be in touch with you. We moved to Vancouver Island with the plan of only staying a couple years, that was 14 years ago and we are still here with no intention of leaving. The climate and easy access to the ocean and mountains makes for a lifestyle our family enjoys.

      I like to think I am the manager of this little venture but I have a wife and 3 little girls who I answer to. Any silly ideas I get about running or doing things are usually put to a stop at the dinner table shareholder meeting every night...ha ha.

      I personally enjoy Scuba diving, skiing, travelling and getting out in nature with my girls. We all like a nice place to stay when we travel and we expect you do too. You can be sure that any property you rent from us is clean, safe, well stocked and comfortable. We want your stay to be hassle free so you can enjoy the time you get to spend here. Who knows, maybe you will decide to stay also!

name: Petie's Cottage - 2 bed cottage
description:
Spacious 1250 sq ft cottage with vaulted ceiling, lots of windows, large kitchen, full size fridge, stove, dish washer, washer/dryer, 2 large bedrooms, sunken living room with propane fireplace, 2 bathrooms one in main area of the cottage & one ensuite, attached deck, barbecue & private parking. Heat pump for heat & air conditioning.
In the country, Colesbay beach 5 min walk, across from Ardmore Golf Course, 5 min from airport, 10 min from ferries, 15 min from Butchart Gardens & 25 to Victoria
host_about:
My husband Howie and I will be your hosts. My mother, Jan and step father, Maurie Turner completed building their home in 1978. This was intended to be and became their dream home. 

They have always wanted to create a bed and breakfast but never got around to it. My mother, unfortunately passed away in 2014. We are now full-filling her wish to open her home to guests from around the world to share and enjoy the beauty of Vancouver Island that we have had the privilege to call home for over 50 years.  

We are in a two phase process. We are opening the first suite in our house at the moment and will have an 1100 sq ft. guest home on the property available by spring. We are continuing my mother's love of flower gardens to create an inviting yard to sit and relax on a warm summer evening or pull a ripe apple or plum from my mother's fruit trees. 

I owned and rented a guest cottage in California back in the '80's and had so much fun and many wonderful memories with our clients. We look forward to meeting you and creating new ones!

name: Panoramic View
description:
This Home is Exempt from BC Laws Prohibiting Short Stays. Come Stay with Us!

Welcome to Panoramic View Cabin~

Light pours into this peaceful A-frame home on a park-like acreage with Gordon's Beach only a 5-minute walk across the road. Gray whales pass by this home in the spring as they migrate to northern feeding grounds, returning in the fall. Roaming pods of killer whales can also be seen offshore, as well as otters, seals, and sea lions. Bring your pets, family, friends, and explore!
neighborhood_overview: Located 10 minutes outside the town of Sooke, this home offers a wonderful escape into nature while being just an hour away from BC's capital city, Victoria. The ocean, parks, hiking, and myriad outdoor activities are all minutes away.

name: Stunning beach house, small pebble walk-on beach
description:
You want beach front? Well this is it!!!
Open to those who desire longer stays at this time, 7 night minimum. Lots of room to spread out both inside and out on this property with 650' of ocean front. The ocean is right off the lawn and the beach has small pebbles.
The bay is always full of boats and so fun to watch.
We are right beside the Port Browning Marina if you have a boat to dock or launch. Also delicious food at the pub and kayak and paddle board rentals.
neighborhood_overview:
We are just a 9 minute drive from the ferry terminal. We are located beside Port Browning Marina. Our Beach House and property (10 acres) make up one half of the bay with 650' of waterfront. Having the marina beside us gives access to boat docking and launching, pub, kayak and paddle board rental. The Driftwood mall is an easy walk with a quaint coffee shop and bakery, Tru-Value grocery store and also Jo's Restaurant.
Also during the summer the Junior sailing club runs 1 week classes.
Its a beautiful bay with boats coming and going all the time.
Otters, seals, herons, eagles and ospreys are spotted all the time.
host_about: Split my time between Pender Island and Maple Ridge with my husband.

name: Family-Friendly Seaside House, Near Ferry and YYJ
description:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION: My business license number is 001854.

This waterfront property offers stunning ocean views and a unique marina atmosphere. It is only 10 minutes drive from the ferry terminal, airport and seaside town of Sydney, 20 minutes drive from the stunning Butchart Gardens and 30 minutes drive from downtown Victoria.

This home is 3,300 square feet with separate living spaces on both levels. This is my primary residence so you can enjoy home amenities during your stay.
neighborhood_overview: The District of North Saanich is located on the Saanich Peninsula of British Columbia, approximately 25 km (16 mi) north of Victoria on southern Vancouver Island. It is one of the 13 Greater Victoria municipalities. The District is surrounded on three sides by 20 km (12 mi) of ocean shoreline, and consists of rural/residential areas, a large agricultural base and is home to the Victoria International Airport and the Swartz Bay Ferry Terminal. Our neighborhood is covered in large forests, it is a migratory bird sanctuary, the neighbors are friendly, and it is safe to live here.
host_about:
My name is Zoe.I'm very lucky to have such a beautiful place to communicate with you. "I have a big house.there are lots and lots of windows. the sun shines on the floor and warms my quilt." that is my dream house and it has come true. 
I love interior design and decorated the house with great care. when you stay here, you'll find that I made a lot of the decorations. 
I want to share this beauty with you and hope you will have an unforgettable experience here.

name: Waterfront 3BR Suite: Soak tub, Fireplace, Parking
description: Experience luxury in our 3-bedroom, 2-bath west corner suite with panoramic ocean views. Start your day with coffee on the balcony, watching bobbing seals at the marina & spend your evenings relaxing in the spa-like soaker tub or by the gas fireplace. This large suite features 8-ft windows, 14-ft ceilings & luxurious furnishings & amenities, ensuring an unforgettable stay. Access our fitness gym w/ocean views & enjoy FREE secure parking, bike storage. Book your exceptional oceanside experience!
neighborhood_overview: Northwest of Victoria, along the southwestern coast of Vancouver Island, lie the communities of Sooke and Port Renfrew. Linked by Highway 14, these two communities are known for their rugged coastlines, tall trees and unspoiled natural beauty. The town of Sooke is located just 40 minutes outside of Victoria it is the closest gateway to the West Coast of Canada. Complete with local cafes, restaurants and breweries Sooke has become a beautiful seaside getaway. Continue up the coastline just over an hour further is the village of Port Renfrew. The area is known as the Tall Tree Capital of Canada, being home to spectacular old-growth forests,  untouched nature, and world class fishing.

name: Sauna / woodstove / soaker tub ocean view retreat
description:
Looking for the coziest of island getaways for a larger group or family? Look no further! Our home has everything you need for rest and relaxation.

Enjoy the beautiful ocean views out the window. Unwind in the large soaker tub and rain shower. Restore with a cedar sauna and cozy up to the woodstove. View the stars from the deck and enjoy the quiet Saltspring evenings.

Nearby are hiking trails up Mt. Erskine and beautiful Bader Beach. The ocean and forest minutes away for exploring.
neighborhood_overview: Our home is in a very quiet end of the road neighbourhood. You’ll have total peace and quiet during your stay. The house has full privacy and no visibility to neighbours. There are hiking trails to Mt Erskine nearby, a minute walk to the trailhead. Bader Beach is a 15 minute walk down the road. Centrally located - Ganges village is 7 minutes drive, Long Harbour Ferry 12 minutes, Vesuvius 10 minutes and Fulford 25 minutes.
host_about: I'm a nature-loving and active traveller, and take advantage of exploring new places and cultures when I can. These days I usually travel as a family with my little ones and husband. love hosting my own homes when I can to make a special travelling experience for others, and can appreciate everything that goes into it, so I’m a considerate and respectful guest :)

name: #208 Honeycrisp Ave - 3 Bed Lovely Upper Suite
description:
We are required by law to rent our properties for a minimum of 91 nights. Please take this into consideration when choosing your reservation dates.

Hello, I'm Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC!

This is a comfortable 3-bedroom upper suite in a brand new house in a suburban neighbourhood in the forested Happy Valley area, near Langford. It's about a 10 minute drive to Westshore Mall, which features lots of shopping & attractions, and about a 30 minute drive to Victoria's Inner Harbour.
neighborhood_overview:
Honeycrisp Ave is a suburban neighbourhood in a rural area, surrounded by the beautiful forests & mountains of Happy Valley. It's a bit of a ways away from town, so a car (or bicycle) is recommended.

- Happy Hill is less than a 15 minute walk away. It's a beautiful forested hill with a nice view at the top!
- Five Spice Indian Cuisine Restaurant is less than 10 minute walk away.
- Happy Valley Market grocery / convenience store is less than 10 minute walk away.
- Olympic View Golf Course is less than a 5 minute drive away.
- Beautiful Witty's Lagoon Beach is less than a 10 minute drive away - a great spot for swimming!
- Westshore Town Center is less than a 10 minute drive away with many options for shopping, restaurants, and entertainment.
- Jordie Lunn Bike Park is less than a 10 minute drive away with mountain biking, jumps, dual-level pumptrack, and more!
- Esquimalt Lagoon Migratory Bird Sanctuary is less than a 15 minute drive away wi
host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

name: Adorable two bedroom suite with free parking
description:
New and Modern, beautifully decorated suite with a small yard in the heart of Victoria's popular Gordon Head. Just steps from the Ocean and Mt Doug park .8 minute drive to University of Victoria ,15 to downtown, 20 to ferry, and airport.

Direct bus to downtown and Uvic.

We welcome infants and children age 5 and above, but do not provide any special amenities.

Send us a message for longer stays or any questions you might have.
neighborhood_overview: Gordon Head is a seaside neighborhood in the municipality of Saanich in Greater Victoria, British Columbia, Canada. The University of Victoria is located partly within Gordon Head along the southeast boundary. Gordon Head is quiet and charming. Those who are looking for a place  that's away from the bustle of downtown, but still accessible easily, the neighborhood of Gordon Head is perfect. It is a seriously green community, with over 28 parks, access to greenspace, playgrounds, and tennis courts is abundant. Not to be missed is Mount Douglas Park, the largest park in Saanich, which at 450 acres provides a number of different trails, perfect for walking and hiking.

name: SALTY Stay Cabin
description:
The Salty Stay Cabin has been thoughtfully designed to help you unwind and reconnect. A Scandinavian cabin nestled amongst a lush landscape filled with willow trees, an orchard and multiple nearby beaches.

At the cabin you will find two bedrooms, a large kitchen, outdoor cooking area (spring 2025), patio + so much more. We invite you to Stay Salty with us! Reconnect to yourself, your loved ones + nature.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on one of the most coveted locations on salt spring. The south end and quiet menhinick drive. It’s a peaceful laid back road filled with locals. We have access to multiple beaches within a 5 min walk and some great hikes.

Farm-stands, and popular food venues are within a 10 minute drive. It’s a great place for a home base and relaxing getaway.
host_about:
I grew up on the ocean, I could float before I could walk. I am at home when I have salt air flowing through my hair and adventure ahead of me. It is these parts of myself that have helped me focus my creative spirit into my business, SALT : a sustainable lifestyle brand that represents a story of adventure, the ocean, and what it is to protect our planet. You can find Location both on Salt Spring Island and in Victoria. 

Salt Spring has been my home since I was 2. It is my home, it is where I feel most grounded and I can't wait to share a piece of it with new friends.

name: Quince Cottage - Quiet and relaxed
description:
Welcome to Quince Cottage, where relaxation meets coziness!

Nestled in Saanich, this little retreat is your private haven away from the hustle and bustle.

Immerse yourself in the tranquil surroundings, enjoying the modern comforts and thoughtful touches that make your stay unforgettable.

Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or an extended stay, our guest cottage is designed to be your home away from home.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our quiet neighbourhood in beautiful Victoria, BC! Nestled in a friendly and vibrant neighborhood, Quince Cottage is the perfect base for your Victoria adventure. Just moments away, discover a variety of local shops, cafes, and restaurants, providing a taste of the community's diverse culinary scene. Take a leisurely stroll through the nearby parks or hop on a bike to explore the scenic trails that surround us via the famous Galloping Goose Trail.

Conveniently located near public transportation, you're just a short ride away from downtown Victoria's historic landmarks, museums, and the picturesque Inner Harbour. We are also close to the University of Victoria and Camosun College.

Whether you're seeking tranquility or adventure, our neighborhood offers the best of both worlds. Come and experience the unique blend of urban convenience and natural beauty at Quince Cottage!

description:
Ideal for families w/ children looking for some space & quiet with easy access to all Victoria has to offer. Great setup for a trip with grandparents or two families traveling together.

Our house is 10 mins walk to a beautiful playground w/ dog park & a quick drive to Willows Beach, countless trails, or downtown

Hillside Mall (Thrifty's grocery, Canadian Tire, Walmart, Shoppers, Bolen Books) is less than 10 mins walk.
neighborhood_overview:
Oaklands is a popular neighbourhood with young families because of its parks and proximity to downtown Victoria. Many of the streets are lined with mature chestnuts, Garry oaks and flowering fruit trees.

Oaklands is also home to Hillside Mall, a shopping centre for and a growing neighbourhood village, known as Haultain Corners.

Don’t miss the Oaklands Sunset Market (Wednesday evenings June to September) which features local food, artisan goods, live music, and a beer garden.
host_about: I enjoy hiking coastal trails, rummaging through thrift shops, and planning trips to places near and (very) far.

name: Centrally Located Charming, Bright Character House
description:
Welcome to Mulberry House! We’re so happy to host you! Enjoy a 1940's character home restored with love, all to yourself. Hardwood floors & lots of sunlight. Kitchen stocked with pots & utensils. Driveway fits 1 car + more parking a few steps away on the cul-de-sac.

Short drive AND walking distance to amazing restaurants, 2 grocery stores, liquor stores, multiple amenities, downtown Victoria, & tourist attractions. Lots of public transit & bicycle lanes at your door.

License number 00042443.
neighborhood_overview:
A great location, kitty corner between the Fernwood community, and the Quadra Village community. Both neighborhoods are about 5 blocks in either direction encompassing Royal Athletic Park Stadium, Save On Memorial Arena, and the Crystal Pool, which is across the road from the nearest gas station.

Haultain Corners is approximately 5 blocks away, east, and has the nearest yoga studio. Farm fresh produce can be found at the Local Grocer. and there is a small friendly cafe there called Koffi, right on Haultain.
Haultain Fish and Chips is a classic diner with Best in the City awards and nice service, just across Cook Street.

In Fernwood, just up Bay Street, there is the Belfry
host_about: I work for a national women's health charity. I have lived in Quadra Village since 2012 and I love it here. It's diverse, has a lot of good food and parks, and is soo close to downtown! Don't hesitate to contact me for local recommendations :)

name: Creekside Oasis Garden suite with Water views
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene 2 bedroom suite. Enjoy all that Victoria has to offer knowing you can relax with the family in this peaceful suburban oasis. Rest easy in the comforts of our home. Also enjoy a cocktail or coffee next to our beautiful natural creek.

Located near the World famous Bear Mountain Resort featuring two of the Jack Nicklaus designed premier golf courses. We are also located within minutes of Downtown Victoria, Butchart Gardens and Malahat Skywalk.
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet family friendly neighbourhood. Close to pubs, restaurants, and shopping. 2 minute drive to a variety of grocery stores and convenience stores including Costco. Conveniently located mins from highway 1 and 5 mins from Victoria General Hospital.
Walking distance to Thetis Lake and hiking trails.
Short driving to golfing, wineries, lookouts and Provincial Parks
host_about: Hello we are Janet and Doug. We are married and have older children that are grown and moved out. We are looking to host our guests in our creekside rental. Its a quiet little oasis that we love to call home. Im a local business owner and have travelled extensively around the globe so we are welcoming to everyone. We enjoy spending our free time with our grandkids.

description: Brand new two bedroom one bathroom suite is available now. Our suite is a self-contained space with its own entrance, guests have the entire suite to themselves. neighborhood_overview: Very quite, safe  and friendly neighborhood with endless walking trails . host_about: I am outgoing, love nature  and long walks by the ocean with my husband.  The suite  has been made for maximum comfort. We hope you will enjoy your stay.

name: Forested garden oasis with hot tub
description:
This hidden forested 1/2 acre garden oasis is just steps from beaches and nature trails, while also only a 15 minute drive from the heart of downtown Victoria.

The house is a cozy yet modern home with spacious open-concept living areas and a large deck with pocket views of the ocean and nearby islands.

Our home is best suited for a young family as we have all the toys and gear you could need, but it would also work well for 6 adults looking for a getaway within the city!
neighborhood_overview:
Ten-mile point is a little slice of nature in the city. While only a 5 minute drive from the University of Victoria, this neighbourhood feels like it is far out in the country. It is quiet, serene, surrounded by ocean and home to many nature trails.

Here are some neighbourhood highlights:
- Beach access is across the street less than a moments walk away
- Less than a block to trail head that leads into Konuksan Park and Phyllis Park (Can easily go for an hour walk through forested trails)
- 3- 5 minute drive to UVic
- 3 minute drive to Cadboro Bay village (grocery store, liquor store, pharmacy, pub, Thai restaurant, corner store, local cafe, Moka House, dentist, bulk food store, sushi and other shops)
- 3 minute drive to Cadboro Bay Beach and playground
- 15 minute drive to downtown Victoria
- Quiet neighbourhood and no street lights on ten-mile point (better for stargazing)
host_about: I love traveling and I also love staying home. I love sharing my space with people and sharing lots of tips and ideas for fun things to do in this city that I feel so lucky to be able to call home! I have traveled around the world and lived overseas, but am always excited to return to Victoria when the time comes. I run a charity focused on revolutionizing the education system, and am also a teacher. I yoga, I run, I bike, I write, I kayak... I love too many things to list. I have so far had amazing experiences both as an AirBnB host and as a guest.

name: Downtown Condo by Inner Harbour, Secure Parking
description:
Almost 650 sq.ft. of modern living, our one bedroom and den, non-smoking condo is located in the posh "Astoria" highrise with secure parking.
With Inner Harbour, Legislature, Beacon Hill, and Royal Museum a 3-minute walk away, our neighborhood is considered the most desired in downtown Victoria. In our condo, you will be in the midst of Victoria's happening scene yet enjoy a restful sleep as it is located on a quiet street. A fully equipped gym is in the building for the exercise enthusiasts.
neighborhood_overview: Located in Downtown Victoria, our condo is an easy 30 minutes drive from the Victoria Airport, and is by the water.  It is two blocks away from the world famous Victoria Inner Harbour, the Legislature buildings, and the Beacon Hill Park.  Those in the mood for shopping can visit Government Street for the latest fashions and tourist souvenirs. If you are travelling for a conference, you will just be a block away from the Victoria Conference Centre.  Royal BC Museum, Victoria Bug Zoo, & the Miniature World are all within a few minutes walk and are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda.  If you would like to check out an event or a game at Save-On-Foods Memorial Centre, a 15 minute stroll will get you there.  North America's oldest Chinatown, COHO Ferry Terminal, and Victoria Clipper Ferry Terminal are around 8-10 minutes walk away.  Kayaking and scuba diving are available close by and offer great chances to get out on the surrounding water.  Or you can seek out an adventure

name: Sunset Cove - a cozy & quiet waterfront A-Frame
description: Nestled beside a gentle brook in a sheltered cove, enjoy the solitude of this unique and quiet waterfront A-Frame house. Close to parks and just 15 minutes to Sooke, 45 minutes to Victoria. Relax on the large wraparound deck or rest by a crackling fire in the massive stone fireplace. Boat or seaplane moorage at the private dock. All three bedrooms have finest bed linens and modern bathroom amenities. Full kitchen. Adventurous? Climb the dragon's back to sleep in the top floor hideaway!
neighborhood_overview:
Sunset Cove is on a private 150-acre (61 hectares) estate that is primarily old growth and second growth westcoast temperate rainforest.
The nearest neighbours are in the caretaker cottage that is set back behind the A-Frame but close enough in case anything needs attention.
The East Sooke Grocer & General Store is about 1km down the road for essentials, or have a seat outside and grab a fresh made burgers at TasteBuds right next to the store.
host_about: As a native of Victoria Canada I like to take advantage of opportunities for walks, hikes, and swimming. Glad to head to warmer climes when the weather is dark and rainy at home!

name: Sea View Luxury Escape with Sauna
description: Enjoy stunning views of the Olympic Mountains and Sooke Basin in this newly-renovated vacation home nestled in the tranquility and natural beauty of East Sooke. This home is bright and spacious with an open concept living area. The expansive outdoor patio space lends the perfect coastal ambience to this invigorating and relaxing destination in the heart of the West Coast’s uplifting landscapes.
neighborhood_overview:
East Sooke is where mother nature spoils us with her natural beauty. Guests may take in the majestic views of the Olympic Mountains, Juan de Fuca Straight, Sooke Harbor, and Wiffin Spit.

This property is located right off East Sooke Rd with a paved driveway for easy access to the house. It is right in the heart of East Sooke Regional Park, a 3,500 acre ocean playground with over 50km of hiking trails, beaches, and includes the West Coast Trial. The town of Sooke is complete with local cafes, restaurants, and breweries and has become a beautiful seaside escape. Sooke Centre is also close to the surrounding areas of Langford and Victoria.

name: The sunset cabin with hot tub on Galiano
description: Welcome to our Galiano oasis! Our mid-century modern cabin originally built in the 60’s has been fully renovated with spectacular ocean view and a hot tub on the deck. Located on the top of the bluff we have an 180 view of Montage Marina, Parker Island and Salt Spring Island. Enjoy the hot tub while watching eagles, ravens,  and unbelievably beautiful sunsets. It's centrally located on Galiano  with  less than 10 minutes walk to Pilgrimme, one of the best restaurants in Canada.
neighborhood_overview: Galiano Island  is one of the Southern Gulf Islands located between Vancouver Island and the Lower Mainland of British Columbia, Canada. Due to its mild climate and position in a confluence between two different tidal systems, Galiano Island is home to a large variety of fauna and flora, and it's a great location if you like to explore outdoors, hiking into forest and beaches.
host_about: I’m a Brazilian living in Canada. I live half of the time in Vancouver and half in Galiano Island, a little piece of paradise in British Columbia. I love to go for a hiking with my husband and my dog, to travel and  meet people from all over the world and listen their stories.

name: Oceanfront Beach House
description: Spectacular oceanfront luxury home  where zen meets West Coast.  It's all here..work, play, sleep and rest here.  Perfect place to spend a winter writing, reflecting or escaping the wintery deepfreeze from wintery cold climates. This is the ultimate in an island getaway.The luxury 4 bedroom home with gourmet kitchen has all you need for a relaxing and adventurous vacation on Salt Spring Island or a place to retreat and work in a restorative, tranquil environment.
neighborhood_overview: quiet rural neighbourhood.  close to town of ganges.  far enough away for privacy
host_about:
Arriving from Edmonton many years ago on the West Coast,  I soon fell in love with the ocean, the mountains and the plethora of outdoor activities.  Salt Spring became a frequently visited island to continue to explore the outdoors and take a break from the whirlwind of city life.  Salt Spring is home to many fond memories of family and friends and I am grateful to be able to have this sanctuary to share.

Working in the healthcare industry for many years as a nurse, I am committed to healing and health in a very holistic way.  My home on Salt Spring offers this holistic approach to health and wellness. The calm waves of the ocean, the serenity of the sunsets, the freshness of the forests bring a mindful and present state of being.  I am also a new Kundalini yoga instructor and teach classes in the newly renovated studio on the property.  Guests are welcome to drop in to yoga classes when scheduled.

And if you need a dose of action, Ganges is a short hop away to pick up groceries, take in the Saturday market, take a yoga class or shop at the many galleries.  

It is all here!

Our property is a small hobby farm with animals out on pasture and all the space you need to breathe and relax. A gorgeous patio gives you a view over the duck pond where morning coffees are in full sun.

Located next to the ferries and airport

name: Shelter Jordan River | Modern 3bd Forest View Home
description:
Our 3 acre property is tucked in the rainforest, a short walk from the ocean and surrounded by magical beaches & parks.

Enjoy the surf, beautiful hikes, cozy beach fires, and true West Coast rainforest. The home features striking sitting-nook windows that give the illusion of floating among the trees, along with a gourmet chef’s kitchen, 3 plush king beds, skylight loft, spa-inspired bathroom, luxury mudroom, outdoor shower and a sauna new for summer 2024.
neighborhood_overview:
We’re in the heart of Jordan River, known for its parks, beaches, hikes and surf.

Our street is very quiet and peaceful with a steep path to the beach just down the road (at the end of the street where Cormorant Way meets Petrel Dr). We are close enough to hear the waves crashing when the swell rolls in!

name: Waterview - Modern Family-Friendly Home
description: This beautiful 1930s’ home has views of the water, a modern-renovated design, and a lovely open-concept kitchen/dining, perfect for reconnecting with loved ones in beautiful Victoria. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, make a gourmet meal and enjoy it in the private backyard. At night, cosy up around the fireplace as you watch the sunset over the water. Stroll along the Gorge Waterway Park, head to a nearby cafe/shopping plazas or drive a quick 10 minutes to Downtown Victoria Harbour.
host_about:
Lauren was born and raised on the West Coast, and loves bragging to the world that Victoria BC is her home. Dan is from the East Coast. Together along with our two boys, we call Victoria home. However, as much as we love our home base, we do love to get away and experience new places whenever possible! 
  We love to entertain, and most of all the opportunity to share our beautiful home, city and country with visitors.

name: Unforgettable Oceanfront Experience in Sooke, BC
description:
Welcome to Otter Point House, a one of a kind residence built adjacent to a rocky headland overlooking the Pacific Ocean. The House sits on over an acre of land with an expansive view of the coastline, the straight of Juan de Fuca, and snowy U.S. Olympic Mountains.
There are many viewpoints throughout this 5 BR house where you can see marine life, tranquil sunrises and moonlit waters. Bring the family and have an unforgettable experience. Come experience Island of the Sea Wolves in real life!
neighborhood_overview: Otter Point House is 6 KM from the town of Sooke and 44 KM to downtown Victoria.  From Victoria airport, drive west to Sooke and then drive another 10 minutes on scenic West Coast Road.   Otter Point House is located on the southwest point of Vancouver Island, surrounded by panoramic ocean views and old growth rainforest.  Perfectly situated,  Sooke and surrounding area is in a micro climate that receives more sunshine in the summer and less rain in the winter, than the nearby cities of Victoria and Vancouver.  It rarely snows in Sooke and when it does, it quickly melts away.
host_about: My wife and I own the Otter Point House which is a true gem of a home on the waterfront near Sooke, BC. We've had many memorable times at the Otter Point House, and invite you to also create your own memories at this unforgettable place.

name: Heritage Farmhouse w/ hot tub at Malahat Farm
description:
This historic home at Malahat Farm beautifully merges the days of old with the luxuries of today. Watch the morning mist with coffee in hand after stoking the fire from last nights burn in the wood stove. Whether you’re soaking in the hot tub outside, claw foot tub inside or simply enjoying the expansiveness of space in the home, the days will surely blur in time.
Surfing at Jordan River is only 15 min away or skip down to Muir Creek to take in the breathtaking sunsets and fresh ocean air.

name: Beautiful beachfront Villa on 80 acres of farmland
description:
Bring your family to enjoy our incredible 80 acre oceanfront farm and stay in our beachfront villa. The stunning beach house is modern and filled with amenities to make your stay fun, private and relaxing while you explore the surrounding farm full of animals and fresh food or take a stroll along beautiful Ella beach.

The beach is just steps from the house and you have full access to over 1400ft of private waterfront where you can watch the seals and otters play.
neighborhood_overview:
Our farm is located inside the cute oceanside town of Sooke, BC. Close to nature and the beaches of the southern coast of Vancouver Island. All basic services are just a few minutes away and greater Victoria can be reached in about 30 minutes drive.

The beach house is set back on the farm away from the main farming activity. On the farm we grow fresh vegetables, have tons of fruit and friendly animals you are more than welcome to visit. It is truly a magical place.
host_about: Hi everyone! We are a family of 4 who have a big dream to create a beautiful farm on the southern tip of Vancouver Island and make it a place for everyone to visit, love and enjoy.

name: Sunrise on Cordova Bay Beach
description: Welcome to one of the most peaceful neighborhoods in Victoria! This modern upper level suite sits directly in front of the beach providing breathtaking views of the sunrise to enjoy while you sip your coffee in the morning. Whether you want to take a quiet stroll on the shoreline or head into the historic downtown area of Victoria, we can assure you that your stay here will have you coming back for more!
neighborhood_overview: Located close to many of the gems that Victoria has to offer, we can assure you that you won’t run out of things to do! Directly beside your suite, there is access to a public beach where you can indulge in water activities such as kayaking or paddle boarding. Alternatively, you can hop on a bike towards the Lochside Trail and head into either Sidney or downtown Victoria. If you are looking to explore, we recommend visiting the beautiful Butchart Gardens or the Royal BC Museum.

name: Seabrook Farmhouse with Hot Tub & Swimming Pool
description: This modern 3800 sq/ft farmhouse is situated on a 7.5 acre Berry Farm in Central Saanich.  Your view overlooks trees & has a private setting.  5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, futon in rec room, house sleeps 15 people. Amenities:  hot tub, outdoor shower, 18 ft (4 ft deep) / 8ft movable swimming pool for kids (12 in deep) outdoor lounging/dining area with large gazebo, games room, children's play room connected to their bedroom,  It is 3-5 minutes to Butterfly World & Butchart Gardens.  DT 20 min away
neighborhood_overview:
This property is off of Stelly's Cross Rd. There is a residential area and the further you drive down Seabrook, you will start to see ranches and farms. Our farmhouse is located at the end of Seabrook Rd on the left hand side.

We are 4-5 minutes away from Butchart Gardens and Butterfly World.
Ferries are 20 min away.
Airport is 15 min away
Downtown Victoria is 20 min away
Uptown Mall and Mayfair Mall is 15 min away. Just take the HWY towards Victoria and you will see it.

name: The Royal Bay Getaway
description:
OWNERS PRIMARY RESIDENCE. Waiting on Licence Number.

This is a Lovely 3-bedroom 2-bath Suite located Just 5 minutes from the Beautiful Beaches of Royal Bay

Conveniently located in one of Colwoods most desirable areas, Everything you need for a comfortable stay is just minutes away.

Just a Quick drive south to Downtown Victoria, Or a quick drive north towards the world-famous China / French / Mystic Beach.

This is the perfect place to call home during your visit to our beautiful Island.
neighborhood_overview:
Colwood's oceanfront boasts exhilarating views that take in the City of Victoria and span all the way around to the Olympic Mountains in the distance. Colwood has an abundance of beautiful, forested parks and trails to enjoy. The Southern Vancouver Island climate makes it easy to enjoy the outdoors all year round, with warm, dry weather in summer and mild, wet winters. Rich in history, the City of Colwood dates dating back to the 18th century and is home to many of Vancouver Island's most significant historical landmarks.

Also popular among visitors and locals alike is Esquimalt Lagoon. The Lagoon, bordered by the vast forests of the Royal Roads University and Fort Rodd Hill, is a beautiful oceanside park within walking distance of the City Centre. A designated bird sanctuary and historic First Nations site, is a point of pride for locals and a popular recreational destination for visitors who want to bird watch, walk, swim, dive or kayak, and is home one of the most beautif
host_about:
We are Alex and Janelle

We have been hosting short term rentals for many years now.

Because of  our love for traveling, providing a clean and comfortable space for guests visiting our city is something that fulfills us and makes us happy.

name: Lakefront Retreat Suite
description:
Welcome to Shangra-Lake Suite. Lakefront lounging, minutes from conveniences.

Spacious 2 bed/1 bath self-contained suite, a perfect oasis. Close to urban amenities with a peaceful lakefront vibe.
Stay, play, swim, fish, sunbathe, kayak, paddle, float, bike or hike, golf, watch live sports, or 30 mins away, downtown Victoria's historic attractions. A weekend getaway or a weeklong vacation is where style meets laid-back, and we can't wait to share it with you!
neighborhood_overview:
Langford, British Columbia, Canada
We are close to everything that will make your vacation fun and easy! Costco, Walmart, Superstore, Winners, Home Depot, etc.

Nearby recreation and entertainment are abundant. Westhills stadium is a ten-minute walk to catch pro soccer and Canada 7's rugby. Boulder House, for indoor rock climbing, bowling, an arena, an arcade, and Cineplex for movies all within walking distance. Wild Play, and tons of hiking trails in the area! The new Malahat Skywalk recently opened and is a 15-minute drive!

For a complete immersion in nature, a 30 min drive west takes you to the magnificent beaches and surfing spots at Jordan River, China, French and Sandcut Beach. Several golf courses all within 20 minutes. Downtown Victoria is 30 minutes by car or transit.

Royal Roads University campus and Hatley Castle are five minutes away.

name: Escape to Spring Gate, A Private Garden Estate
description:
Located within walking distance of Elk Lake, this charming house is surrounded by gardens, making it a tranquil retreat.

Upon entering, you will be greeted by a bright and airy living area with high ceilings, and plenty of natural light. The open concept kitchen and dining area is perfect for entertaining, and the large windows overlook the gardens.

description:
Welcome to our stunning 2-bedroom, 2 bath, 8th-floor condo in the heart of Downtown Victoria! This beautifully decorated unit has high ceilings, elegant white quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances & plenty of natural light.
Enjoy your morning coffee on the private balcony as you embrace the panoramic views of the city & mountains. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to ensure an unforgettable stay. Just steps to some of the city’s best cafes, shops & restaurants.
neighborhood_overview:
Our charming Airbnb is centrally located in downtown Victoria and easy walking distance to all the major attractions:

1. Market Square - One of Victoria's most unique shopping areas, mixed of over 30 retailers consisting of one-of-a-kind boutiques, restaurants, and services (8-min walk)

2. Chinatown - Explore shops, savor food, and experience a rich cultural atmosphere (9-min walk)

3. Royal BC Museum - Discover BC's history, culture, and nature (12-min walk)

4. High Tea at the Empress Hotel - Experience elegance over tea at Victoria's iconic Empress Hotel (12-min walk)

5. Inner Harbour - Watch buskers, enjoy waterfront views, and see Parliament Buildings. (15-min walk)

6. Beacon Hill Park - Stroll through gardens, trails, and a petting zoo (25-min walk)

7. Fisherman's Wharf - Taste fresh seafood, see seals, and rent kayaks or take tours (25-min walk)

8. Whale Watching - See Vancouver Island’s massiv

name: 3 bdrm house near castle, downtown, large yard
description:
We are a family that rents our house while we are away. Our 3 bedroom house is a 1928 character home that we just renovated and it has a very large yard.

Its a 5 minute walk to Craigdarroch Castle as well as to Government House. Both are great places to stroll and our neighborhood has many trees and is quiet. From our home you can walk to downtown Victoria within 30 min depending on where you are going and it’s a great place to cycle from.

The city has a rule that 90 days is the minimum.
neighborhood_overview:
Rockland is an historic neighbourhood, located southeast of downtown.

The neighbourhood contains a notable concentration of grand homes, heritage architecture and lush gardenscapes. The two largest, and most famous, of Rockland’s residences are the Craigdarroch Castle built by the Dunsmuir fortune, and Government House, which is the residence of the Lieutenant Governor of British Columbia.

Some of the area’s most famous architects designed many of the homes in Rockland, including Samuel Maclure and Francis Rattenbury, who also designed the Provincial Legislature.

The Art Gallery of Greater Victoria and the Langham Court Theatre are both located in Rockland. And you are in easy walking distance of the waterfront, downtown and the boutique shops of Cook Street Village or Oak Bay Avenue. name: Gwawis Guest house
description: Welcome to Gwawis Guest House “Raven of the Sea”. We invite you to enjoy our beautiful and comfortable oceanfront home situated on the calm and serene  Duck Bay. We are situated in Vesuvius ,  just a short 10 minute drive to the town centre of Ganges where you have many dining options, shops and  the famed Saturday Market to peruse. Enjoy the nature trails at Channel Ridge and  Duck Creek Park or hop aboard our paddle boards to truly explore all the beauty of the marine life before you.
host_about: Both Josh and I have done extensive travel around the world so we can appreciate what makes accommodation truly special and welcoming. We are required by law to rent our properties for a minimum of 91 nights. Please take this into consideration when choosing your reservation dates.

neighborhood_overview: Follow your own path, down some of ours. Victoria is a true one-of-a-kind land on the Pacific coast. Surrounded by water and full of adventure, Victoria finds itself nestled between the tranquil waters of the Salish Sea and the mighty rainforests of Vancouver Island. Discover boutique hotels fit for a queen, world-class attractions, and fresh farm-to-table dining that’s measured on a scale of metres not miles. On your next adventure, explore Victoria.
host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

name: Otter Cove Waterfront Suite
description: Waterfront walkout suite, steps away from Portage Inlet and own private dock. Enjoy a relaxing getaway in Victoria, swim in the warm summer sea, cozy up on the day bed while gazing across the bay, or take a walk along the beautiful Gorge waterway. 10 minute walk to all necessary amenities and about 15 minutes drive to downtown. neighborhood_overview:
Our suite is located on the Gorge waterway, close to downtown Victoria but with easy access to the ferry, airport, and the highway to head up-island.

You can walk or run on the paved path along the Gorge, or access the Galloping Goose Trail. We are a short 15 minute drive from beautiful hiking or mountain biking at Gowland-Todd Provincial Park, or the trails at Hartland.

Downtown Victoria is a 10 minute drive or 20 minute bike ride away. There is a grocery store, liquor store, pharmacy, and cafe a 15 minute walk or 5 minute drive away.
host_about: I live and work in Victoria with my beautiful fiancée, Maura. We are happiest relaxing at our home, paddling on the gorge or out enjoying the gastronomy of Victoria. We host and are hosted around the world.

name: The Salty Dog| Oceanfront Getaway + Great View
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and new two-bedroom condo style cottage.

★ Oceanfront
★ Dog Friendly
★ 2 spacious bedrooms
★ A comfortable pull out couch
★ Comfortably sleep 6 guests
★ Private patio
★ Breathtaking taking views of the Port of San Juan
★ 2 full bathrooms

This unit is complete with luxurious furnishings, a full kitchen, and all the comforts of home a very serene space.

** Dog friendly only
** Please note there is new build construction up the road
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. This cottage has neighbours beside and above it. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Misty Haven Main House
description: Welcome to our private retreat! Our property features a peaceful garden oasis with a full patio, gas fireplace, and a relaxing whirlpool. Savor your morning coffee under the trellis with kiwi vines while enjoying the sound of the running fountain. Our fully fenced backyard is perfect for guests with pets.  Cozy up around the outdoor firepit with seating. Please note that the outdoor firepit is shared with guests in the other suite.
neighborhood_overview:
This neighbourhood boasts convenient proximity to various attractions and destinations in the area. Nature lovers will appreciate being just 3 km away from the stunning Elk Lake and Beaver Lake Park, while garden enthusiasts can explore the beauty of The Buchart Gardens only 6.5 km away. For beach-goers, Island View Beach Regional Park is just 10 km away.

The neighbourhood is also conveniently located for those traveling by air or ferry, with the Victoria International Airport just 15 km away and the Swartz Bay Terminal only 21 km away. And for those looking to explore Victoria's vibrant downtown core, it's just a short 15 km drive away. With its prime location and diverse range of nearby attractions, this neighbourhood is the perfect base for your next adventure on Vancouver Island.

name: #161 Brentwood- 3 Bedroom. Beautiful Ocean View
description:
We are required by law to rent our properties for a minimum of 91 nights. Please take this into consideration when choosing your reservation dates.

Cozy 3-bedroom, 1 bath Brentwood Bay vacation home with breathtaking ocean views. Perfect for a quiet getaway. Walking distance to amenities, including the famous Brentwood Bay Resort and Spa.
Experience the peaceful and tranquil setting and enjoy the natural beauty of Brentwood Bay. Book now and create memories that will last a lifetime!
host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

description: ‘The Great Escape - Shirley & BH’ is secluded & surrounded by forest.  You will have your own Hot Tub.  The Coach is a 40' luxury Coach that has an electric fireplace, large slide-out, Corian counters, forced air heating & 1 Gbps WiFi.  There’s a propane fire pit, BBQ outside, wood fired pit, with lots of wood.  Has a Queen ‘Sleep Number’ bed, sofa bed and Bunkbeds & sleeps 6.  Has a bathroom, washer & dryer, is fully furnished & equipped.  Bring clothes, food & enjoy The Great Escape - Shirley

name: Brand New Seaside Home in Royal Bay

Bring families and friends to this Brand New Modern home located in beautiful Royal Bay neighborhood.

10 mins walk to Royal Beach Park, Lagoon Beach, Esquimalt Lagoon Migratory Bird Sanctuary and Colwood Waterfront Park. Starbucks, NoodleBox, Quality Foods, Cascadia Liquor are also within the vicinity!

10 mins drive to 5 different golf courses. Olympic View Golf Club, Royal Colwood Golf Club, e.g.

Graced with stunning landscapes, thoughtfully designed neighbourhoods, and safe, walkable streets, Royal Bay is an oceanside village community where good living comes first.

name: Cozy Seaside Bungalow
description: This bright and cozy family friendly bungalow backs onto a spacious outdoor space featuring a Lg patio with a view of the ocean. host_about: I am 32 year old RN with a passion for travel and meeting new people.  I have used Airbnb on many trips myself and have thoroughly enjoyed the experience. I love to be outdoors enjoying the wilderness just as much as I love having a glass of wine on my deck taking in the views.  I look forward to meeting you and hope that you will appreciate my space and what Vancouver Island has to offer as much as I do!

name: Silvan Suite: Wake Up to Views & Private Theatre
description:
Experience a front-row seat to the beauty of Vancouver Island from our Executive Suite at Bear Mountain – the perfect getaway for those looking to escape reality and immerse themselves in the magical beauty of the West Coast.

Kindly note: Your booking is for the spacious suite located on the lower level of the house, not the entire property.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Bear Mountain, Langford, BC - where luxury living meets untamed wilderness. Our neighborhood is a nature-lover's paradise, boasting breathtaking views of the rugged mountains and tranquil forests that surround us.

If you're an adventurer at heart, you're in luck! Bear Mountain offers a dizzying array of outdoor activities, from world-class golfing on our stunning courses designed by Jack Nicklaus, to heart-pumping hikes up Mount Finlayson, to thrilling mountain biking trails that will leave you breathless. And if you're lucky, you might even catch a glimpse of our resident black bears, who roam freely in the mountains (don't worry, they're friendly).

When you're ready for a break, head to the heart of our neighborhood, where you'll find a vibrant community of artisans, chefs, and shop owners who have made Bear Mountain their home. Sample the best of West Coast cuisine at one of our many fine dining restaurants, or sip a locally-roasted coffee at one of
host_about:
I'm a passionate lover of life and its countless beautiful moments.

I appreciate every facet of existence, which led me to become an Airbnb host. To me, Airbnb isn't just about sharing a space; it's about sharing the art of living. 

In my Airbnb, you'll discover more than mere comfort. It's a unique slice of life brimming with art, culture, and warmth.

So pack your bags, leave your worries behind, and come stay in our little piece of paradise!

name: Peaceful log home in the trees
description:
Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place.
Surrounded under a canopy of trees, you will enjoy the nature around you. Wake up to the bird chirping and watch the deer graze the land around you. We have a seasonal creek that runs through the property where you can fall asleep to the water running. There's a big fire pit for those evening nights to stare gaze, cook hot dogs and make some smores! With a mix of modern and rustic, this home is the perfect nature getaway.
neighborhood_overview: We are steps away from an abundant of nature enjoyment.  We are situated right by the galloping goose for  a nice bike ride or stroll.  There are lots of hikes for all levels, from very well marked trails to a bit of an adventure.  We are less then a 5 minutes drive to the popular Sooke potholes provincial park where you can spend the day hiking, swimming, for the dare devils, cliff jumping or just soaking up the sun!
host_about:
I'm a lover of art, plants and adventures.  I have 3 kids including my husband ;) and we spend most of our summer days by a the ocean or lake swimming, diving, beach combing, fishing or just soaking up the sun.  All of which i hope you will enjoy while you stay at our home. 
Happy memory making!

name: Waterfront Luxury Escape and Sauna
description:
NOTE: East Sooke is exempt from B.C.'s short-term rental principal residence regulations.

Enjoy stunning views of the Olympic Mountains and Sooke Basin in this newly-renovated vacation home nestled in the tranquility and natural beauty of East Sooke. This home is bright and spacious with an open concept living area. The expansive outdoor patio space lends the perfect coastal ambience to this invigorating and relaxing destination in the heart of the West Coast’s uplifting landscapes.
neighborhood_overview:
East Sooke is where mother nature spoils us with her natural beauty. Guests may take in the majestic views of the Olympic Mountains, Juan de Fuca Straight, Sooke Harbor, and Wiffin Spit.

This property is located right off East Sooke Rd with a paved driveway for easy access to the house. It is right in the heart of East Sooke Regional Park, a 3,500 acre ocean playground with over 50km of hiking trails, beaches, and includes the West Coast Trial. The town of Sooke is complete with local cafes, restaurants, and breweries and has become a beautiful seaside escape. Sooke Centre is also close to the surrounding areas of Langford and Victoria.

Make sure to walk the spit! This iconic piece of nature is an easy walk with well maintained paths. For the adventurous souls, Adrenaline Zip Tours is nearby offering tours for all ages. Whale watching, horseback riding, and world class fishing tours are also available adventures in Sooke. For bikers the Galloping Goose trail ex

name: Bright Character Home
description: Our home is a fully-furnished, very bright character house from 1912, with original fir flooring, stained glass, and 10-foot ceilings on the main floor.  We’re in James Bay, which is Victoria’s oldest residential neighbourhood. Downtown, cafes, grocery stores and the beach are all within a short walking distance. Kid-friendly set-up.
neighborhood_overview:
We’re in James Bay, which is Victoria’s oldest residential neighbourhood (actually the oldest on the west coast north of San Francisco). This means that there are lots of stately Victorian and Edwardian houses, as well as horse-drawn carriages which bring tourists down our street each day to look at them.

Our house is an excellent base for exploring both the urban and natural highlights of Victoria. We’re less than a 10-minute walk to the Inner Harbour (you can see the statue on top of the Parliament Buildings from the master bedroom window), and a couple minutes more to the rest of downtown.

A couple minutes’ walk in the other direction takes you to the staggeringly beautiful cliffs overlooking the beach on Dallas Road, and also to Beacon Hill Park (Victoria’s original and best city park).
host_about: I'm originally from Switzerland, but live in Victoria, Canada now where I teach French in High School. I love to travel and meet new people!

name: Beautiful Basement Suite - Sleeps Six
description:
A unique stay on Salt Spring Island! Enjoy breathtaking views, access to a vast network of trails, and our famous sunsets. You will have private use of our downstairs which contains a bathroom (basic toiletries provided), 1 bedroom with a queen size bed, 1 sitting room with a double pull out couch, and 2 single trundle beds (kids size).

We serve a continental breakfast from 7:00 - 9:00 am in the kitchen or on the patio and we will do our best to accommodate special requests.
host_about:
Hello! We are Romy and Bryce and live on Salt Spring Island. We are originally from Alberta and moved to the island 10 years ago – we were drawn to the natural beauty, relaxed pace, and friendly people. 

We will be happy to share our recommendations to ensure you get the most out of your trip but if you are just looking for a relaxing getaway, we trust you’ll find that on our property with our breathtaking views, network of trails behind our house, and famous sunsets! 

We love to travel, especially on cycling trips, and enjoy experiencing different cultures and meeting new people. We are excited to have the opportunity to welcome you to our home in this special part of the world and hope to meet you soon. 

If you are interested in event space (weddings, retreats, etc.) we have a barn on our property to accommodate all types of gatherings.  Please visit our website for more information; Stone Bridge Island Farm Salt Spring Island.

name: NEW Deluxe 2BR Haven: Spectacular Views, w/Parking
description: Step inside our contemporary 2-bedroom, 2-bath 15th floor condo, boasting panoramic views - the ultimate destination for your stay in the heart of Victoria. This meticulously crafted suite showcases high ceilings, expansive floor-to-ceiling windows & a state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen. It's open-concept design is best suited for relaxation, entertaining & creating cherished moments with your loved ones. Discover Victoria's vibrant dining, shopping & entertainment scene just steps from your door!
neighborhood_overview:
Our charming Airbnb is centrally located in downtown Victoria and easy walking distance to all the major attractions:

1. Royal Theatre - Catch a live performance or show at the Royal Theatre, known for its cultural and artistic events (9-min walk)

2. The Bay Centre - For shopping enthusiasts, The Bay Centre is just a short walk away, offering a variety of retail stores (10-min walk)

3. Market Square - One of Victoria's most unique shopping areas, mixed of over 30 retailers consisting of one-of-a-kind boutiques, restaurants, and services (14-min walk)

4. Victoria Bug Zoo - Get up close and personal with a variety of fascinating insects and arachnids (14-min walk)

5. Chinatown - Explore shops, savor food, and experience a rich cultural atmosphere. (15-min walk)

6. Miniature World - View detailed dioramas with historical and fantasy scenes. (15-min walk)

7. Royal BC Museum - Discover BC's history, culture, and na

name: 1910 home close to the ocean
description:
Located in historic Esquimalt, a 10 minute drive or take a water taxi 10 minutes away to downtown Victoria, this bright and spacious 1910 two bedroom one bathroom house has been recently refreshed to provide a clean and comfortable stay.

Located in a friendly neighbourhood with a short walk you will find the ocean at Saxe Point Park and Mccauley Point, our local coffee shop, a grocery store, a bike path to downtown and an easy bus route and more!
neighborhood_overview: It is a peaceful area with a 10-15 minute walk to beautiful parks including Saxe Point Park, Macaulay Point Park and High Rock Park. Thursday evening there is also a fun farmers market nearby.
host_about: I trained to be a commercial pilot but then decided to roast coffee instead. I own a cafe in one of the nicest places on earth, Vancouver island. I love the outdoors and adventure, fitness and fun. I don’t take life too seriously and like to laugh as much as I can, I think the most important thing in life is the people you share it with.

name: Bright rancher steps to the sea with hot tub
description: Bright spacious family home you will love - perfect space for a family to enjoy an extended vacation steps away from 2 of vic's most stunning ocean-side parks (McCauley Pt and Saxe Pt) full of beaches, trails, mountain views and even outdoor climbing.  Massive back yard, extremely quiet area, everything is in the area (groceries, takeaway, rec-center with amazing pool for kids, best playgrounds + splash-park).  10 min bike to center of downtown victoria or 5-6 minute drive depending on traffic.
neighborhood_overview: Esquimalt is a 5 minute drive to downtown victoria but feels almost like you're in the country it's so quiet nestled by the coast.   Great biking, colourful family neighbourhood with 2 of the most beautiful oceanside parks in the whole region right beside our home. Virtually zero crime in our neighbourhood due to proximity of military base.  Brand new rec center and library - breweries, trampoline park and great restaurants - you don't even need to head into downtown if you don't want to!
host_about:
Hi we're Shael & Claire..  I'm Canadian and Claire is from France.  We're both  professionals, based in Vic BC - fairly new here ourselves and often exploring the amazing island whenever we have the chance so we can be full of fresh advice.  We're on airbnb mostly because it's a great place to find interesting places / people / eco friendly accommodation and we hate hotels !   We're quiet and respectful and happy to chat but will likely be out exploring the outdoors most of the day but are happy to help you plan your trip in and around Victoria, let you know of any events going on and give you some hot tips - it's an amazing city !

Thanks!

name: The Surf Chalet
description: Welcome to The Surf Chalet, an oceanfront home perched on a bluff with hot tub overlooking the Salish Sea. Escape from the daily grind and take in all the west coast has to offer. Spend your days enjoying local world class surf and your evenings recharging in this newly renovated space located on over an acre of treed oceanfront property.
neighborhood_overview:
The Surf Chalet is located in a quiet, rural seaside neighbourhood with large lots and trees throughout, making it a private oasis.
*Note: we do still have neighbours and ask that you be mindful and respectful.

A few noteworthy spots:

- Numerous spots for surf including Jordan River (a 10 min drive) where you’ll also find The Cold Shoulder Cafe

- Flea Beach is a 3 min walk from the house, perfect for a stroll with your morning coffee

- French Beach is a 5 min walk on the other side and also has a great day use area and park for kids at the far end (approx 15-20 min walk)

- Historic Sheringham Lighthouse is just up our road, about a 20 minute walk

- Shirley Delicious cafe is a must and only a 5 min drive

- Stoked Pizzeria serves up delicious woodfired pizza and only a 3 min drive
host_about: We are a young family living, working, and surfing on the west coast.

Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

This unit is geared towards family and friends. Walk down the stairs to the lower 2 bedroom unit. The bedrooms overlook the firepit and have an ocean view. name: The Point | Hot tub + Sauna+ Panoramic Ocean View!
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Entire home with 180-degree ocean view, wraparound deck & private hot tub and sauna! Situated on a waterfront rise with unrivaled privacy and sweeping 180 degree views of Port of San Juan, the San Juan River and Pacheedaht Beach...The best view in Port Renfrew, hands down!

Well equipped kitchen with everything you'll need- just bring your favourite food to go in the double fridges!

+3 bedrooms,
+Sleeps 7
+High Speed Internet
+Hot tub
+Sauna
neighborhood_overview: The Point is located in Port Renfrew, BC at the mouth of the San Juan River, in the neighbourhood known as Beach Camp. The street is a quiet cul-de-sac which offers a serene getaway while staying close to town. The house is walking distance to both Pacheedaht Beach and Little Beach.

name: #129 Two Bedroom condo, downtown Victoria
description:
We are required by law to rent our properties for a minimum of 91 nights. Please take this into consideration when choosing your reservation dates.

Luxury 2-bed condo in Victoria's downtown. 4th floor, great views. Inclusive rental: cleaning, WiFi, robes, slippers. Steps to restaurants. Wheelchair accessible, bright, and safe. Book now for a hassle-free stay!
neighborhood_overview: Follow your own path, down some of ours. Victoria is a true one-of-a-kind land on the Pacific coast. Surrounded by water and full of adventure, Victoria finds itself nestled between the tranquil waters of the Salish Sea and the mighty rainforests of Vancouver Island. Discover boutique hotels fit for a queen, world-class attractions, and fresh farm-to-table dining that’s measured on a scale of metres not miles. On your next adventure, explore Victoria.
host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

name: 2BR Charming Downtown Retreat, close to Chinatown
description:
Discover the perfect urban getaway in Downtown Victoria at our 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo. This stylish unit has an abundance of natural light & features a private patio, offering a serene outdoor space surrounded by trees & greenery right in the heart of the city. With a fully equipped kitchen & modern amenities, it's the ideal home away from home.
Explore the city's diverse attractions at your doorstep & make cherished memories in beautiful British Columbia. Your Victoria adventure starts here!
neighborhood_overview:
Our charming Airbnb is centrally located in downtown Victoria and easy walking distance to all the major attractions:

1. Market Square - One of Victoria's most unique shopping areas, mixed of over 30 retailers consisting of one-of-a-kind boutiques, restaurants, and services (8-min walk)

2. Chinatown - Explore shops, savor food, and experience a rich cultural atmosphere (9-min walk)

3. Royal BC Museum - Discover BC's history, culture, and nature (12-min walk)

4. High Tea at the Empress Hotel - Experience elegance over tea at Victoria's iconic Empress Hotel (12-min walk)

5. Inner Harbour - Watch buskers, enjoy waterfront views, and see Parliament Buildings. (15-min walk)

6. Beacon Hill Park - Stroll through gardens, trails, and a petting zoo (25-min walk)

7. Fisherman's Wharf - Taste fresh seafood, see seals, and rent kayaks or take tours (25-min walk)

8. Whale Watching - See Vancouver Island’s massiv
host_about:

name: Comfortable Beach House Suite
description: Stay in a gorgeous modern 2 bedroom 2 bathroom suite with beach access! Located in Cadboro Bay and minutes from UVic. Close to a vibrant shopping center with all desired amenities available and ocean access to Gyro park. The space includes bedrooms with 1 queen bed, 1 twin bed, a comfortable sofa bed, 2 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, bath amenities, desk workspace, 40" smart TV, patio, yard, and parking. neighborhood_overview:
Cadboro Bay is a vibrant community with a shopping center that includes local grocery store, coffee shops, hardware store, restaurants, liquor store, transit and more! Peppers Foods is 2 min from the house and has everything to satisfy your fresh grocery needs.

2 min walk from Cadboro Bay beach and Gyro Park. Fantastic ocean views, and an excellent playground and field for children. Park includes parking, picnic tables and public washrooms. If you are lucky, you may catch a glimpse of the mythical Cadboro-saurus.

Under a 10 minute walk or 2 minute drive to the University of Victoria.

description:
Have more fun with more of your friends! This space allows up to 6 to enjoy this space for a very affordable price.

Coming home with your own crowd and maybe a few extras occupying the other queen room; professionals, and jet setting travellers returning to a warm and cozy home to share stories and relax.

This is a quiet, mature community with families and work-at-home professionals.

Previous guests have taken day trips to Tofino and Whistler in the past! (I wouldn't recommend, but it has happened!)

name: Sea Shell Cove|Pet & Child Friendly!
description: Where the Rainforest meets the Sea! Welcome to our new AIRBNB with all new beds, pet friendly vacation home away from home! Five minutes from fern forests, beaches, breweries, and the little town of Sooke, which offers fabulous hiking trails, surfing, beachcombing, whale watching, biking on the Galloping Goose Trail, swimming in the Sooke River Potholes, paddle boarding/Kayaking in the lakes or even in the Sooke basin!
neighborhood_overview: Our quiet neighbourhood is perfect for your family getaway with your hosts next door just in case you need anything at all! The AirBNB is self contained with everything you need upon arrival, with welcome goodies, local beer or wine, the full kitchen has complimentary coffee/tea, full spice rack, cooking oil, Keurig coffee maker as well as a Bodum, toaster, microwave, dishwasher, full size oven and refrigerator, fully stocked with dishes/cutlery/pots and pans/bowls/glasses/mugs, dishwasher, and full size washer/dryer upstairs. Backyard is fully fenced for your pets! We also have included tennis rackets/balls, snorkel gear, beach towels, beach chairs, floaties, life jackets, wetsuit, 5 bicycles and sand toys! We also have a couple bikes for touring the neighbourhood or biking on the Goose. We want you to feel right at home. Parking available for 2 vehicles. Keyless entry. family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

name: Oceanview, woodstove & sauna 2 bdrm Blue Retreat
description:
Looking for a treehouse-feel getaway for a group or family, you found it at the Blue Retreat Salt Spring (look us up on Google or Insta for direct booking!)
Enjoy a sauna & sweeping ocean views. Nestle by the cozy wood stove on chilly days. Gaze at the stars from the deck and enjoy the quiet island evenings.
Access the island's beauty with walking access to hiking trails up Mt Erskine and Bader Beach.
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is in a very quiet end of the road neighbourhood on Salt Spring Island.

Salt Spring Island is a beautiful, unique place with a lot of fantastic natural space, impressive coastline and a fiercely independent identity as an oasis of art, music, sustainable farming and rustic lifestyles, just off the coast of Vancouver.

There are hiking trails to Mt Erskine nearby, a minute walk to the trailhead. Bader Beach is a 15 minute walk down the road. Centrally located - Ganges village is 7 minutes drive, Long Harbour Ferry 12 minutes, Vesuvius 10 minutes and Fulford 25 minutes.
host_about: I'm a nature-loving and active traveller, and take advantage of exploring new places and cultures when I can. These days I usually travel as a family with my little ones and husband. love hosting my own homes when I can to make a special travelling experience for others, and can appreciate everything that goes into it, so I’m a considerate and respectful guest :)

name: Rae Manor -waterfront fully restored historic home
description:
Rae Manor, a 15 minute drive from Ganges Harbour, is a beautiful 100 year old Tudor Craftsman house situated on the ocean on Sunset Drive, Salt Spring Island.

This fully renovated house features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a large kitchen, spacious living room and dining room all with breathtaking views of the water and Vancouver Island.

This 2.5 acre property has an entertainment style backyard with outdoor kitchen overlooking the ocean and a front yard with a vineyard and lavender garden.
neighborhood_overview: Rae Manor is on the water front.  It  is located  in a residential area of Salt Spring. There are great walking/hiking trails right across the street from the house.
host_about:
I am  retired lawyer.  My wife and our two grown boys love to travel. 

Our home on SSI, however, is where our heart is.
