neighborhood_overview: located in the Wild Coast Cottage community. Neighbouring cottages close by.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Community Livin' Spacious Home
description:
Rest and reconnect in this spacious and serene space.
As a fellow traveller I love coming back to a place of comfort and spaciousness after a huge day sightseeing, working or training as an athlete.
Imagine a home with a mature and interesting crowd of other professionals and jet setting travellers returning to a warm and cozy home to share stories and relax.

Maybe you prefer to engage in the kitchen or disconnect in your own space, enjoy comforts of the TV room or patio for some alone time.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a quiet, mature community with families and work-at-home professionals.
You will find parks and trails nearby.
There are great cycling routes and beautiful back roads to enjoy. With THE BEST coffee shop only a few minutes walk down the road, a supermarket not much further and the beach a 20 min walk away you are spoilt for choice on what would make a relaxing morning enjoying a loungey morning.

Downtown is an easy 20 minute drive away and if you're looking for a ride downtown for a taxi home I am more than happy to accomodate :)

Previous guests have taken day trips to Tofino and Whistler in the past! (I wouldn't recommend, but it has happened!)

description:
Nestled within the sought-after Cordova Bay neighbourhood, It offers the ideal sanctuary for you to relax, rejuvenate, and regain your energy. With ample space, it comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests, making it a superb choice for a getaway.

University of Victoria - 7 min drive.

neighborhood_overview:
Situated to the north of Mount Doug Park and flanked by the serene ocean on the east and the convenient Pat Bay Highway on the west, Cordova Bay gracefully extends to the southern borders of the Municipality of Central Saanich.

In the early 1900s, Cordova Bay beckoned as a charming seaside summer haven, accessed from Victoria by stagecoach and train. It boasts one of Greater Victoria's most exquisite sandy beaches, complete with several accessible public points. You'll also discover The Beach House, a rare gem among Victoria's seaside restaurants, perched right along Cordova Bay, providing a beloved gathering place for the local community.

For golf enthusiasts, Cordova Bay proudly hosts the 18-hole Cordova Bay Golf Course, alongside the nine-hole Ridge Course for pitch and putt. name: Kings Corner - Downtown Victoria - Resort Living
description: Nestled in the heart of Victoria's downtown core, this exceptional south west corner unit boasts all new furniture with 2 King Size Beds & Pull out Queen Couch.  Rare to find: upgraded bedroom window systems that virtually eliminate all noise to create tranquility amidst the vibrant city buzz. This building ensures security & offers an array of luxurious amenities, including heated outdoor pool, hot tub, exercise room, & picturesque courtyard. Wrap around balcony, separate office space & parking
neighborhood_overview: You will be in the absolute heart of downtown Victoria. This condo has a perfect walking score and you can easily walk to iconic Inner Harbor and Parliament Buildings.  You are minutes away from the BC Museum, ocean, theatre, shopping, restaurants, bars and tour operators.
host_about:
After transferring for work and spending 2.5 months in various Airbnb's and hotels with one large German Shepard and 2 loveable little toddlers, we fell in love with the idea of having our own Airbnb to host others. 

We loved the little touches, the love, the warmth and the utilities Airbnb's could offer us during this time. 

And we fell madly, deeply in love with vibrant Victoria and all it has to offer. It is a truly magical place for all. ❤️

name: Modern 2BR Guest Suite - 5 min from Royal Bay
description: Welcome to your tranquil escape in the heart of Latoria, Langford, where modern comforts meet natural serenity. Nestled in a peaceful, family-friendly neighborhood, our newly-built guest suite offers the perfect blend of convenience and relaxation. You're just 8 minutes from downtown Langford, 5 minutes from Royal Bay with its trails, playgrounds, and ocean views, 8 minutes from Hatley Castle, 10 minutes from Albert Head Lagoon park, and 25 minutes away from the bustling heart of Victoria.
neighborhood_overview:
Langford, British Columbia
We are located in a friendly neighbourhood, surrounded by beautiful nature. We are just 5 min away from Royal Bay, where you can find grocery stores, playgrounds, coffee shops, and ocean views. A short 8-min drive to Hatley Castle and downtown Langford, as well as a couple of beautiful beaches. There is also a Red Barn shop 3 min away.

name: Waterfront Sea Haven East Sooke, house and suite.
description:
No parties due to bylaw.

Enjoy this unique and relaxing stay, with stunning views and direct beach access to the Sooke Basin.
Watch the real life nature show with; eagles to hummingbirds, otters, seals, sea lions, salmon to orcas.
Beach comb and see; anemones, crabs, sea cucumbers, sea snails, mussels, oysters.
Find shells and driftwood to remember your stay.
Share this educational experience with the whole family.
The cute separate suite allows for sharing with privacy.
neighborhood_overview:
Supernatural East Sooke. A very quiet country area, boasting tranquility, nature and wildlife.

West Coast wilderness awaits you at East Sooke Regional Park. Experience it as you hike along the windswept rocky coast, over dry hilltops, through dark rainforest to sheltered coves.
It features 50 kilometres of trails through forest, marsh and field. Challenging 10 kilometre Coast Trail. Pocket beaches, rocky bays and tide pools for exploring and scuba diving. Spectacular views of the Strait of Juan de Fuca and Olympic Mountains
host_about: Outdoor adventurer.

neighborhood_overview:
Victoria is a sophisticated gem of timeless quality, named for one of history’s most remarkable women. With a temperate climate and British Colonial heritage, Victoria is a perfect destination year-round. Sights include the world-famous Butchart Gardens, Royal British Columbia Museum and the amazing Victoria Butterfly Gardens. Stroll through Goldstream park where salmon spawn, eagles fly and waterfalls cascade down cliffs. After a full day, head back to the resort to linger over tea. The rooms are angled to maximize water views, and the fireplace will keep you cozy as you look out over the moonlit bay.

Popular Attractions
The Butchart Gardens
Located on an expansive country estate, the 55-acre gardens feature floral displays, meandering paths and expansive lawns. 15 mi.

Royal BC Museum and IMAX Theatre
Learn about the human and natural history of British Columbia through exciting exhibits at the Royal BC Museum. The museum also features the 400-seat
host_about: We love to travel anywhere and everywhere, and enjoy helping others travel as well.

Step inside to find an ambient living room with gleaming hardwood floors and lovingly curated home decors. The fully equipped kitchen boasts granite countertops and stainless steel appliances to cook up a feast. From our unique open deck you can enjoy a spectacular view of Bear Mountain and the cerulean ocean. If you are looking for a special retreat for 4-8 ppl, our home is your perfect sanctuary.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the perfect mountain getaway in the Bear Mountain area. Our place is located just outside Victoria, BC on southern Vancouver Island - a sophisticated and charming region with world-class recreational opportunities, a year round golf climate, stellar fishing experiences and strong local food movement.
Our Bear Mountain home has been thoughtfully sited to take full advantage of the natural terrain and pristine beauty that makes Bear Mountain Bliss such an incredible place to spend your vacation. You’ll find yourself just a short drive from Victoria, BC with direct access to Highway #1.

name: Elk Lodge in Sooke
description: Bring the whole family to this great stand alone house on approx 1/4 acre of privacy. On our property there are Emu’s , Sheep, Ducks , Geese and Chickens. You may also see Elk and Deer passing through your yard.
neighborhood_overview: We’re are approx 5 minutes to the town centre or a 25 minute walk. There you will find all the stores and shops you will need. The local Pubs have good atmospheres and menu selections. Enjoy any of the 3 Craft Breweries in Sooke. There are several walking trails and parks in Sooke. Surfing is approximately a 30 minute drive to Jordan River. Hiking and Mountain Biking trails are plentiful.

name: 2 Bd Upperfloor Ocean Front Home
description:
2 minute drive to the town of Sooke with its many amenities a medical clinic, shops, restaurants, including award winning Wild Mountain restaurant. Gives you the best of both worlds!

Stunning ocean views from all rooms. Take a deep breath and enjoy some sea therapy. Beach access, fly fish, walk the shore or just watch the otters and seals play, and eagles soar. Relax in the outdoor clawfoot tub with an ocean view

Sooke Pot Holes is a ten minute drive for swimming, walking running trails.
neighborhood_overview:
A 5 minute walk takes you to Seaparc rec Center skating swimming weight room yoga spin class

A 35 minute drive to beautiful Victoria
Jordan river is 25 minutes away to watch the surfers, or carry on to
Port Renfrew where you'll find the famous Juan de Fuca Marine trail

name: Cedar Spirit Sanctuary
description:
Welcome to our 10 acre sanctuary in the forest. We have designed our home to be a centre of health and wellness, with a wood-fired sauna, cold dunk tank, red light therapy, and the cleanest water. As our guest, you will have access to it all.

Our home is ideal for a family, with 4 bedrooms (3 king beds and 1 queen between them). One of the rooms is set up as a child's room and the home is appointed with the basic needs for a toddler.

The home backs onto a nature preserve with hiking trails.
host_about:
I am a 37 year old man from Salt Spring Island, BC, Canada. 

I enjoy good healthy food, yoga, surfing, hiking, beaches, and lots of music. I love to travel, and have been fortunate to have seen so many beautiful places in this world.

My style of traveling is to live like a local. Rent an airbnb and settle into the local culture and soak up the parks, coffee shops, and people.

My life motto is: Live with your heart open, and let everything go.

Welcome to San Juan Surf and Stay Tsonoqua House, a rustic home away from home nestled along the shores of the Pacific ocean. Whether you're seeking a peaceful escape or an adventure by the sea, our home is the perfect setting for a great vacation.

name: Executive 3 bedroom Home on Bear Mountain
description: Welcome to Bear Mountain, a desired neighbourhood surrounded by nature and famous for it premier golf courses. Located in the Westshore and minutes away from Downtown Victoria, this executive style home features 3 bedrooms and accommodates up to 6 guests. The house has an open concept layout, vaulted ceilings, a gas fire place, hardwood floors, fully equipped kitchen and is styled with modern furniture and decor. Enjoy outdoor living on the deck that includes a BBQ and outdoor furniture.
neighborhood_overview:
Bear Mountain may be best known for its golf courses and resort accommodations, but it is also one of Langford’s most luxurious neighbourhoods.

Playgrounds dot the neighbourhood and extensive wilderness trails coil around the mountain, perfect for families. The mountain atmosphere promotes healthy living and an active lifestyle. Millstream Village, north Langford’s commercial hub, is just a few minutes off the mountain and has a variety of restaurants, national chains, and boutiques.

neighborhood_overview:
Sooke, British Columbia, is a picturesque coastal community located on the southern tip of Vancouver Island, Canada. Here's a description of what you might find in Sooke:

Natural Beauty: Sooke is renowned for its stunning natural landscapes, including rugged coastline, dense forests, and majestic mountains. The area is dotted with parks, trails, and beaches, offering endless opportunities for outdoor exploration and adventure.

Coastline: The coastline of Sooke features dramatic cliffs, rocky shores, and pristine beaches. Places like Whiffin Spit Park and East Sooke Regional Park offer scenic coastal walks with panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean.

Outdoor Activities: Outdoor enthusiasts will find plenty to do in Sooke, including hiking, biking, fishing, kayaking, surfing, and wildlife viewing. The region is home to diverse ecosystems, providing habitats for a wide variety of plant and animal species.

name: Charming Oak Bay Home
description:
Less than 5 min walk to the ocean, the home has everything you need for a comfortable summer stay.

Safe, quiet neighbourhood, walking distance to restaurants, cafés, public tennis courts, Oak Bay Marina, and Oak Bay Beach Hotel.

I was previously a Superhost on airbnb, and this is the first time I'm hosting again since starting my family a few years ago.

host_about:
I am married with 2 young children.

I own my own online business in the mental health space. 

I was a super host on Airbnb from 2013-2019 and had an excellent experience.

Shirley is renowned for its breathtaking natural landscapes. Towering old-growth forests, pristine beaches, and dramatic coastal cliffs define this picturesque area. Residents and visitors alike can enjoy leisurely walks along the shoreline, birdwatching in the forests, and exploring the numerous hiking trails that wind through the surrounding wilderness.

Boasting some of the West Coast's most stunning Beaches just a short drive away:
- French Beach (walking distance)
- China Beach
- Gordon's Beach
- Sandcut
- Sombrio
- Jordan River
- Mystic Beach
- Hidden Beach

Restaurants

Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC.

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

name: Wild Beauty Full Cottage|Ocean view |Port Renfrew
description:
Enjoy Breathtaking Panoramic Views from our Luxury Cottage. The famous West Coast Trail & San Juan Inlet, will inspire you from our large heated upper deck! Whether you come to explore the incredible hiking trails, fish for halibut & salmon or just to get away from it all, you will love this home away from home. We have brought luxury, comfort and adventure all together at Wild Beauty Cottage.

- Gas Fire Place and Stove
- Ocean view
- Pet Friendly
- 2 hang out spaces

Add us to your *WishList*
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: The Forest Knoll
description:
This beautiful new build is the perfect place to
relax with the family and friends. Nestled amongst the trees on the hill in Jordan River, this sanctuary in the forest has all the comforts of home.

Just 2 min drive to the beach, surf and river (& delicious Cold Shoulder Cafe), or 20 min walk to the beach.
Enjoy the hot outdoor shower after a surf session, or gather ‘round a bonfire. This is the perfect place for you to disconnect from the business of life and enjoy Nature at it's finest.
neighborhood_overview:
Jordan River is a small coastal community with stunning scenery and a playground for outdoor adventures.
The forests trails, river mouth and beach access are breathtaking and draw outdoor enthusiasts from near and far.
On the door steps of the Juan de Fuca trail, and just minutes from French beach, China Beach, and Mystic beach, there is something for everyone.
And the Fold Should Cafe has delicious treats and coffee.
host_about: Born and raised on the coast of BC Canada, I love the outdoors and travelling adventures.  I enjoy meeting people from other places in the world who are also seeking new experiences and adventure.  I think of myself as a responsible and conscientious person.

name: Hidden Peace Retreat with Hot Tub
description: Rural Escape, Modern Comfort. Rest and recharge in Metchosin's rural paradise on the west shore of Vancouver Island, all in the comfort of a spacious ground-level 2-bedroom 2-bathroom suite that has been refinished recently. Enjoy the forest-view large patio, hot tub, fire pit, roaming sheep, wildlife, and local organic food. Just a short walk to Witty's lagoon, waterfalls, beaches, golf club, driving range and more. This place is a quiet luxury for a getaway or just a stop to smell the roses .
neighborhood_overview: Rural communities, peaceful farmland. Nearby golf club, golf driving range, trails and beach, water falls, creek, convenient store, popular restaurant, coffee place, local beer brewery all in walking distance or about 5 minutes drive.
host_about: I was a frequent traveler before the pandemic, and I've been to some parts of the world. Life is full of surprises and challenges, facing it and embracing it with a positive attitude. Life is a gift, that is how we meet. An open mind and an open heart. Thanks to all the help and support from family and friends.  I can't wait to welcome you to the beautiful British Columbia on Vancouver Island at my home❤️ See you soon.

name: Oceanfront Ecofriendly Home
description: Unique, passive solar, grass roofed, water front paradise with a shared deep water dock. Incredible bio luminescence at night that looks like stars underwater! Borders on a wilderness  ocean front park, white sand beach 5 mins drive away with whale and orca watching from the shore. So many experiences nearby; warm lakes, crystal clear river pools, old growth trees marching to the waters edge. From surfing to paddle boarding you are on an adventure close to nature and only 35 minutes to Victoria.
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet dead end street. Very treed and has dark skies for great star viewing. Corner store 5 mins away, all the basics and ice cream! Also two food trucks at the store. 10 mins from the famous Galloping Goose cycling path (old railway trail) to Victoria and further..
Airbnb Property borders on East Sooke park, 2 min wander across the road and your in the park! 50 kilometres of trails through forest, 10 kilometre spectacular Coast Trail, pocket beaches, rocky bays and tide pools for exploring and scuba diving
Spectacular views of the Strait of Juan de Fuca and Olympic Mountains, whale watching and fishing.

Trail Rating: Easy (Aylard Farm) to Challenging (Coast Trail)
Size: 1474.04 hectares
Hours: Sunrise to Sunset

Whale watching boats can pick you up from the Airbnb properties dock.
host_about: Outdoor adventurer.

description:

host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren

name: JDF Waystation with Bunkhouse
description: Private cabin located in the Wild Coast Cottages development in Port Renfrew that sleeps 2 comfortably in the main cabin and 2 more in the detached bunkhouse, all on queen-sized beds. An open living space with exposed beams, equipped kitchen, full bath, WIFI, gas BBQ, wood-burning fire pit, and cozy wraparound deck, bring all the comforts of home with a touch of rustic escape. Walking distance to restaurants, cafes, marinas, and remote beaches, let this be a haven for your escape. Pet Friendly.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Spacious 3 Bedroom Townhome, Sooke, BC
description: Experience a relaxing getaway in this charming and spacious townhome at Sooke Harbour Resort & Marina, nestled in picturesque Sooke, BC. This elegant townhome features 3 private bedrooms, each with its own full bathroom, plus an in-suite washer and dryer for your convenience. The gourmet kitchen boasts beautiful granite countertops, perfect for preparing meals. The primary bedroom opens to a private balcony with breathtaking views of the marina and the stunning Sooke Basin.
neighborhood_overview:
This home is located just minutes from downtown Sooke which offers grocery stores, pharmacies, liquor stores, restaurants, cafe's and shops.

Also, this Resort has a 114-slip marina onsite which is home to many fishing charter companies plus whale watching tours. You can rent a bike or kayak from West Coast Outdoor Adventures which is also located at this beautiful Resort.

Take a drive to one of the many areas offering walking trails, hiking trails, beaches, mountain biking and more. You can't beat this area of Vancouver Island for outdoor activities!

name: South Oak Bay Hideaway
description: Unique opportunity in South Oak Bay, B.C. for three month rental June 1,  to August 31, 2025. Our contemporary home features three bedrooms plus den with ground level entries. Natural and cultivated gardens front and back with bespoke water feature, cozy gas fire circle and gas dining table enhance the living experience. Features chef's kitchen. Proximity to Anderson Hill, multiple wild beaches,  and Victoria Golf Course. This desirable area is very walkable and close to Oak Bay Village.
host_about:
I am a retired librarian married to Brian. We first came to Quadra Island in 1989, loved the environment and immediately purchased our vacant ocean front property the same day after which construction of the main cabin began. The natural environment is so varied that there is always something inspiring to do, see, hear, feel and taste - see the general description section for more in this respect.

I love meeting new people and  take pride and pleasure in introducing guests to the joys of this island but am sensitive to our visitors' needs around privacy and down time. 

I enjoy seeking out unique and comfortable accommodation when I travel and endeavour to incorporate these qualities into your stay on Quadra. I consider myself an approachable, gracious and generous host but not intrusive.

Relationships are very important to me and I love spending time with family and friends.  I am a voracious reader - my most prized possession is my library card. Cooking (and eating) are also amongst my greatest pleasures.

Simplicity in life is what I strive for and I believe that most of what makes us truly happy doesn't cost very much. 

I look forward to hosting you and trust you will enjoy what Quadra Island and our cottage have to offer.

name: Seaside Cottage: Ocean Views & Private Hot Tub
description: Immerse yourself in coastal luxury at our spacious and private three-floor Shirley cottage, nestled on a serene acre with breathtaking ocean views. Relax in the hot tub, unwind on the expansive deck, or discover nearby beaches like French and Mystic. Surrounded by lush trails and old-growth forests, this retreat perfectly blends relaxation and adventure. Just 15 minutes from Sooke or an hour from Victoria, it’s your ideal West Coast escape for group getaways or peaceful family vacations.
host_about:
We are an international family living between the South of France and Canada and travelling widely. We are bilingual/trilingual. English/French/Italian.
We also enjoy the Canadian west coast living. We love hiking, swimming, and yoga.
We are delighted to welcome you to either our cedar cottage on Vancouver Island, or our Provencal home in the South of France. We love being Airbnb hosts because it means we get to share our favourite places, inside knowledge and beautiful spaces with our guests. Please don't hesitate to contact us during your stay if you need to know anything. We love to be able to make your stay memorable and special, by passing on our local knowledge!

host_about: Welcome to Mermaid Crossing Retreat, a seaside sanctuary on Vancouver Island’s Gonzales Bay! I'm Holly-Dale, a corporate learning executive turned wellness retreat curator. I invite you to ‘Drift’ into ‘Just Be-ing’ with sea views, sound baths, yoga, ceremonies, and plant-friendly vibes for true relaxation and renewal. Your retreat awaits!

description:
Please note - We are required by Provincial law to rent our properties for a minimum of 91 nights. Please take this into consideration when choosing your reservation dates.
This beautiful executive home is fully furnished and ready for you to move in. With 5 bedrooms and 4 full bathrooms, you will have everything you need for a comfortable stay. The Primary bedroom has a huge ensuite bathroom with a relaxing jacuzzi tub and the family room has a gas fireplace for relaxing evenings. 4 bedrooms
host_about:
Hi! I’m Don Ohlgren, owner of Be My Guest in BC. 

Over the past 20 years, it's been my privilege to manage my own and other privately owned properties. I currently manage 35+ properties in & around Victoria, BC. 

These vary from one bedroom suites up to eight bedroom executive mansions.
My own staff do all our cleaning and maintenance and I guarantee you a perfect stay – every time.

So whether you are looking for a long-term executive stay, a short-term holiday stay, emergency housing, or a work assignment for a few months, I know I can find the perfect place for you.

I love welcoming my guests to Canada’s beautiful garden city and I look forward to exceeding your expectations!

See you soon,  
- Don Ohlgren
